invocations.description: Returns a pointer to the tile at position x:posx, y:posy, z:posz. If you need more info about the tile data structure, access this
invocations.ex:
local tile = gettile($posx, $posy, $posz)
for i=1, tile.itemcount do
	print(tile.item[i].id, tile.item[i].count)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will print the item id of each item on the tile you are standing at.

invocations.description: Returns the tile relative to the position of your character rx(-8, 9), ry(-6, 7) and rz(-2, 2).
invocations.ex:
for i=-8,9 do
	for j=-6,7 do
		print(i, j, gettile(i, j, 0).itemcount)
	end
end
invocations.exDescription: Will print how many items are on each tile of the screen.
